p: All the data from in vitro tests indicate an average ± SEM of triplicate. The differences between groups were assessed by one way ANOVA followed by the Tukey posttest; for in vivo test, data are presented in the form of an average of 6 mice ± SEM, and the differences between groups were evaluated by ANOVA (two way) followed by Bonferroni posttest and ANOVA (one way) followed by Tukey's posttest. Significant differences were considered at p < 0.05.
